metadata.title: CVE-2024-48424 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A heap-buffer-overflow vulnerability has been identified in theOpenDDLParser::parseStructure function within the Assimp library,specifically during the processing of OpenGEX files.

criterions.comment: assimp package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
qt6-3d package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
qt6-quick3d package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
spring package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
